Setting Workfile Attributes Options

To perform this procedure, you must first select the project database or project you want to configure. The project database or project must also be associated with a configuration file.

To set workfile attributes options:

  1. Select Admin | Configure Project. The Configure Project dialog box appears with the General tab active.

  2. Select Attributes beneath Workfiles. The Workfile Attributes pane on the right appears. The values that display for each option are the settings that are currently defined in the configuration file associated with the project database or project.

  3. Set one of the three After Check In options:

    • Delete workfile to delete the workfile after check in.
    • Keep writable workfile to not delete the workfile after check in and to keep the workfile in write mode.
    • Keep read only workfile to not delete the workfile after check in and to make the workfile read only.

  4. Click OK if you are finished defining options, or click Apply to save the settings and continue to define other options.
